settings.title: Account Creation, Login, and Loyalty Cards
How secure is my information on ShopSM?
settings.answer:
Here at SM, we take your privacy very seriously. We ensure that your sensitive data is protected and encrypted at all times. You can read more about our Privacy Policy.

Should you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to our Customer Care team via live chat or send us a message through our Contact Us page.

settings.title: What should I do if I can't login to my account?
settings.answer:
In case you forget your password, you can reset your password by clicking on the “Forgot Password” option on the login page. We shall send you an email with a link to reset your password. Please click on the link within 24 hours to complete the reset of your account's password.

If this does not help solve your issue, feel free to contact Customer Care via live chat or send us a message via our Contact Us page, so we can check the status of your account.

settings.title: What loyalty cards can I use to earn points on ShopSM?
settings.answer:
What are loyalty cards?

We’ve partnered with SM Advantage, SM Prestige, BDO Rewards, Mom Card, Love Your Body, Stationery, and Ace Rewards to allow you to earn loyalty points every time you purchase products from ShopSM. To earn points, make sure to go to the Loyalty Cards section of your profile to add your loyalty card before you make your purchase. The number of points you will earn for each transaction is reflected in your order summary.

How many points do I earn per transaction?

Our partners from SM Advantage, SM Prestige, and BDO Rewards have existing points per amount conversion. Shopping at shop.sm.com will also give you the same number of points depending on the total amount of purchase, after discounts and promotions.

For more information about each partner’s specific conversion table, please visit SM Advantage or BDO Rewards.

I shopped online, but my points have not been credited to my loyalty card yet. What should I do?

Loyalty points shall be credited once the transaction has been delivered and completed according to the timeline set by SM Advantage and BDO Rewards. Should you need to inquire about your points, please contact SM Advantage or BDO Rewards directly.

settings.title: What's the Address Book for?
settings.answer:
How many addresses can I add to my account?

Our website allows for adding of multiple addresses for convenience of shoppers like you. To add a new address and to set your default billing address, just go to the Address Book section of your profile.

Why am I being asked to enter my name and number again when I add an address, even when I’m already logged in?

We acknowledge that you may not be around to receive your order upon delivery, or that you may be buying the items for someone else. For these cases, we allow customers to indicate a different recipient name and number as the account holder’s name. The name indicated as the recipient name will have to be physically present when our courier partners deliver the order.

Please note that the mobile number indicated on the Address is the number that shall receive the One-Time Pincode (OTP), if shipping method selected is Click & Collect.

settings.title: How do I create an account, login, and manage account?
settings.answer:
Registration and Login

Registering is fast and easy. Just click on the upper-right icon to create an account using your email address. You can also choose to link your existing Facebook or Google accounts to fast track the registration process.

To login, click on the upper-right icon. From there, sign in using your registered email address or just click the Facebook or Google buttons.

Reminder: If you linked your Facebook or Google account to ShopSM, please also log in by clicking Facebook or Google buttons instead of typing your email address manually.

Managing Your Account

To make changes to the information in your account, just visit your profile page by clicking on the My Profile or the Profile icon at the top-right corner of the website.

settings.title: How do I know if my order is successful?
settings.answer:
Once your order has been successfully placed, you will receive an email with the details of your order shortly after you complete the checkout process. Sometimes, the email goes directly to your Spam folder, so be sure to check that as well.

If you have not gotten your order confirmation yet, please also check My Profile > Order History and see if your order has gone through. Otherwise, feel free to contact Customer Care for assistance using our Contact Us page.

As an additional tip, please indicate your Order Reference Number when contacting us, so we can assist you faster.

Once your order is confirmed, you’re all set! Sit back, relax, and wait for us to prepare and ship your order. A notification will be sent to your registered email address once your order is shipped. You can check the status of your order at any time via the Order History page.

For Click & Collect, please wait for us to notify you via text message, before going to the chosen Click & Collect location. You may pick-up your order from the Click & Collect location once you receive a One-time Pincode (OTP) via the mobile number you’ve entered in your profile page. The OTP will be used to pick-up your package.

settings.title: How do I place an order?
settings.answer:
Placing an order using desktop or mobile is easy. Visit ShopSM and browse the different categories and items for something that you might want. Please note that you will have to register and login to your account to complete an order.

From the item page, just add the item to your shopping cart and click on checkout. Follow our simple, 4-step checkout process and you are good to go!

Enjoy shopping hassle free through ShopSM!

settings.title: Can I still change any information after placing my order?
settings.answer:
We’re sorry, but order details such as address, mobile number or product color and size can no longer be changed once order is confirmed. Should there be a need to modify or amend an information, please cancel the order immediately via the Order History page, and place an order again.

Due to the number of people accessing the website at the same time, we cannot guarantee that stocks will still be available at the time of re-order.

settings.title: How long is the delivery timeframe?
settings.answer:
For Delivery estimation: Delivery is estimated at 4-6 days  within Metro Manila and 10-15 days for Luzon, Cebu, Iloilo, Bacolod, and Cagayan de Oro City.

For other Visayas and Mindanao orders, they may be delivered within 10-15 days and may also be delivered longer or after the Enhanced Community Quarantine (ECQ) period is lifted in some areas that are still in lockdown.

We now deliver within Metro Manila, Luzon, Leyte, Bohol, Iloilo, Palawan, Roxas, Bacolod, Dumaguete, Samar, CDO, Davao, Iligan, Misamis Occidental, Agusan Del Norte, Zamboanga, Bukidnon, Zamboanga Del Norte and Cotabato.

Same as support, we are operating at a limited capacity and we are following strict government guidelines for the duration of the GCQ and ECQ for some areas.

Rest Assured, that ALL orders would be delivered while making sure they are up to par with our safety standards.

 

The SM Store Click and Collect 

For Delivery to nominated address 

We process all orders as soon as we receive them. Delivery time frame varies depending on delivery address. We will update you via email once your order is shipped. We endeavor to deliver your items as follows:

Metro Manila – 2 to 5 working days Luzon – 3 to 5 working days Visayas and Mindanao – 4 to 7 working days

Example: If you order on October 23, 2019 (Wednesday) and your delivery address is located in Mindanao, your order is expected to arrive between October 29 to November 4, since it excludes weekends and holidays.

For FREE pick up at THE SM STORE-Click & Collect

Your order shall be ready for pick up within the following lead times, after receiving the One-Time Pincode (OTP):

Metro Manila – 1 to 2 working days Luzon – 3 to 5 working days Visayas and Mindanao – 4 to 7 working days

Example: If you order on October 23, 2019 (Wednesday) and your the Click & Collect location is located in Luzon, your order is expected to be ready for pickup between October 28-30, since it excludes weekends.

Additional Reminders

1. Additional 15 days may be observed for items with high capacity power (e.g., battery pack or rechargeable batteries) and liquid content (e.g., ink cartridge, perfume), if to be delivered outside of Luzon. These items will be shipped via sea due to airline safety restrictions.

2. Delivery to addresses outside of direct serviceable areas may have longer lead time. 

3. Orders received on or before 4PM from Monday to Friday shall be processed on the same day. Meanwhile, orders received beyond 4PM shall be processed the next working day.

settings.title: I need more information about cancellation of orders
settings.answer:
Can I cancel some items in my order after it has been placed?

No, we are unable to allow partial cancellation of orders at this time. Rest assured we are working to make this feature available for you in the future.

Can I still cancel my order after it has been shipped?

We are really sorry, but an order cannot be cancelled anymore once it has been shipped. The order has already been turned over to our courier partners and is on its way to you.

You can check the status of your order at any time via the Order History page.

Until when can I cancel my order?

Your account’s Order History page will show you a Cancel button if it’s still eligible for cancellation. Once this button disappears, your order can no longer be cancelled, as it may have already been processed or turned over to our courier partners for delivery.

Are there any charges if I cancel my order?

We do not charge any fees for cancellation of orders.

How will I know if the cancellation of my order has been accepted?

The status of your order will show “Cancelled” as indicated in your account’s Order History page. A notification shall also be sent to your registered email address.

I used credit card to pay for my order. How will I get a refund after I cancelled my order?

We endeavor to process the refund immediately. The credited amount should reflect in your next billing statement. At times, it may take longer than usual, depending on your bank’s policy.

I received a Credit Memo after cancelling my order. What is it for?

Credit Memo is an official document that contains the amount to be refunded to your card. It is not, in any way, a form of payment that can be used to purchase an item on ShopSM or THE SM STORE.

Will redeemed vouchers be re-usable when I choose to cancel my order?

It will depend on the terms and conditions of the voucher. For vouchers marked as one-time use only, unfortunately this cannot be re-used again if you choose to cancel your order.

settings.title: Are the products on sale at ShopSM authentic?
settings.answer: ShopSM only sells guaranteed authentic merchandise. We work hard to ensure that each item you receive is of the highest quality.

settings.title: How can I get more information about a product?
settings.answer:
How do I know if the product is available for order?

If the item is available for order, you will be able to add the item to your cart.

If the item is currently out of stock, you will be prompted with an out of stock notice in the product description page. We encourage you to add out of stock items to your wishlist, so that you will be notified via email once the product is back in stock.

How can I check the available sizes and colors?

On the product details page, you can check if the item/s you are interested in have any other sizes and colors available at the time of your purchase.

Where can I get more information about a product?

If you have found something that you like and want to learn more about the product, simply click on the item and you will be directed to the product page of that item, where you will find more information about the product, including features, colors, sizes and other important details.

Should you need any additional information, feel free to reach out to us via the Contact Us page.

settings.title: Do your products come with warranty?
settings.answer:
Most of our products, especially those that have electronics in them, have standard manufacturer’s warranty. We highly encourage you to check the item upon receipt to ensure they work as advertised on the site.

If the item fails to work, you may generate a return request from the Order History page, then bring the item to any of THE SM STORE branches to request for a replacement. Please note that all products sold online must follow our Return and Exchange Policy.

settings.title: I saw a product on shop.sm.com before, but I cannot find it anymore. What should I do?
settings.answer: Products and offers in our website may vary from time to time depending on demand, season, and availability. Please come back to check on new offers from time to time or sign up to receive our newsletter.

settings.title: What are vouchers for?
settings.answer:
What is a voucher?

A voucher comes in an alphanumeric code, which you can use to get promotional discounts on applicable items from ShopSM. The voucher may be available on limited time basis, and is governed within the written terms and conditions of the said promo.

How do I know that the voucher has already been applied to my order?

For discount vouchers, you will see the deducted amount on your order summary prior to completing the checkout. Please take a closer look on the summary to make sure the discount has already been applied before confirming your order.

Am I allowed to use multiple vouchers in one checkout?

The use of vouchers may vary from time to time. Please make sure to read the terms and conditions to learn more about voucher eligibility and limitations, if any.

Are vouchers applied automatically or do I have to manually input the voucher code during checkout?

ShopSM may offer different voucher executions from time to time. As such, you may experience vouchers being applied automatically or other vouchers requiring manual input of code upon checkout.

Please make sure to read the terms and conditions to learn more about voucher eligibility and limitations, if any.

May I still add a voucher after an order has been confirmed?

Vouchers may no longer be added once the checkout process has been completed and your order has been confirmed. You can still use the voucher within its validity period on your next order, subject to the terms and conditions.

Why am I unable to use a voucher?

Each voucher comes with its corresponding terms and conditions. Please make sure to read it first prior to using the voucher on your order to avoid any inconvenience. Terms and conditions may include one or more of the following:

Minimum purchase requirement – this is the minimum total amount of your order to be eligible for a promotional discount Validity period – this is the date range of when a voucher can be used Product specific – this is a particular brand or product that needs to be part of your order to be eligible for promotional discount Card specific – this is a particular credit, debit, or loyalty card that needs to be used during checkout to avail of the voucher First time users only – this is an eligibility condition where voucher is only applicable for use by customers ordering for the first time New users only – this is an eligibility condition where voucher is only applicable for use by customers who have just registered on the website Other terms and conditions may be added as necessary

settings.title: What payment options are available on ShopSM?
settings.answer:
What payment options are available on ShopSM?

ShopSM offers a variety of ways to pay for your order. You can either pre-pay your order online using credit or debit card, or settle the amount in cash upon delivery.

What is Cash on Delivery?

Cash on Delivery is an alternative payment method, without having to use a credit or debit card. Once you’ve completed your order, our team will prepare and ship the items right to you. Our courier partners will be happy to collect payment upon delivery of your order. Now you can shop from the comfort of your own home even without a credit card. 

Does your courier partner provide cash change?

We encourage customers to prepare the exact amount of payment to avoid any inconvenience. Our courier partner will endeavor to provide change as much as possible.

Why am I not able to select Cash on Delivery for Click & Collect orders?

For our initial launch, Click & Collect orders shall accept credit or debit card payments done through our website. We look forward to be able to offer cash payment method in the future.

What credit and debit cards are accepted?

Most major credit and debit cards such as Visa, Mastercard, JCB and American Express are accepted through our payment gateway partner, iPay88. Some cards may not be accepted due to limitations from your card issuing bank. Rest assured your credit and debit card details are stored safely by our payment gateway partner.

Do you offer installment payment plans?

Installment payment plans are being worked on and will be available in the future. For now, we offer credit card and debit card – straight purchase, apart from cash on delivery.

Why was my card charged the wrong amount?

Items for delivery may incur shipping fee, which is reflected on your summary of charges prior to completing the order. Please check if your order was charged this fee, as this might be causing the discrepancy. We highly recommend reviewing the order summary before completing the checkout process.

If you have indeed been charged incorrectly, please contact Customer Care here, so we can assist you immediately. We would appreciate it if you can prepare the following information prior to contacting us:

Customer Name Order Number Amount that should be charged Amount that was charged Bank Information Do you keep my credit or debit card details?

We do not collect credit card details directly. All credit and debit card information is handled by our payment gateway partner, iPay88. Rest assured that your card details is kept safe and private. Ipay88 is PCI DSS compliant, and a trusted partner of ShopSM and many other online sites.

Can I use a credit or debit card that is not under my name to place an order?

For security purposes, ShopSM only allows orders to be placed by the card holder. Please make sure you own a credit or debit card before proceeding with a card transaction with us. Otherwise, you may opt to use cash on delivery as your payment option.

How do I know if my payment was successful?

For card transactions, you will receive three email notifications after successfully placing your order – an order confirmation notification, a message from iPay88 confirming the amount debited from your card, and a sales invoice.

Please check your spam/junk folder for any emails from us. Otherwise, if you do not receive these emails, please reach out to Customer Care here, so we can address this concern for you.

I did not receive my sales invoice. What should I do?

For prepaid orders, your sales invoice is sent to your email address shortly after you place your order. For cash-on-delivery, we send your sales invoice via email after your order has been delivered. Please give us up to three (3) business days to confirm the delivery and send your sales invoice.

Kindly make sure to check your spam/junk folder for the email notification coming from us. Should you not receive the sales invoice after three business days after delivery of your order, feel free to reach out to Customer Care here, so we can assist you further.

settings.title: What is Click & Collect?
settings.answer:
Click & Collect is our FREE in-store pickup option available to customers and available in select branches. All you need to do is order your items on the website and wait for us to inform you via SMS/text message when your package is ready for pick-up at the selected branch.

Once ready, just drop by our store and pick up your item armed with the One-Time Pincode (OTP). It’s that quick and easy. You are given up to five (5) days from the date of notification to pick up your order from the selected location.

 

How soon should I pick up my order from the Click & Collect location?

Orders are requested to be claimed five (5) days after receipt of the OTP. Unfortunately, orders that remain unclaimed after the said duration shall be cancelled. When this happens, a notification is sent to your registered email address.

Are all items available in any of the Click & Collect locations?

Items are available in most of the Click & Collect locations. Don’t worry, branches that cannot serve certain items will not be selectable during the checkout process.

How do I place an order via Click & Collect?

To order using this option, just select this as your preferred shipping option during the checkout process, and indicate which particular location you would like to specifically pick-up your order.

Can I change the location of my pick-up after placing my order?

Sorry, we are not able to change pick-up locations once you have made your order. If it is absolutely necessary to change the pick-up location, please immediately cancel the order and place another order again.

Due to the number of people accessing the website at the same time, we cannot guarantee that stocks will still be available at the time of re-order.

settings.title: Where are the Click & Collect locations?
settings.answer:
Click & Collect is available at the following THE SM STORE locations in Metro Manila ONLY:

CUBAO

NORTH EDSA

MEGAMALL

settings.title: How do I collect my order from a Click & Collect location?
settings.answer:
How do I collect my order from a Click & Collect location?

Picking up an order from our Click & Collect locations is fast and easy.

When your order is ready to be released at your chosen Click & Collect location, we will notify you via email and SMS. The SMS message you will receive from us is very important as this will also have your One-time Pincode (OTP). Please make sure that the mobile number in your profile is up-to-date to avoid any issues during pick-up.

Armed with your OTP, visit the chosen Click & Collect location inside THE SM STORE and present your OTP to our Customer Service Associate. He/she will assist in locating and releasing your order once the OTP has been verified as correct.

What if I lost my One-time Pincode (OTP)? Can I still pick-up my order?

No, we cannot release your order without the OTP you received, as this is our only way to verify that you are the correct recipient of the order. We can re-generate the PIN if necessary from the Click & Collect location – however this will still be sent to your nominated mobile number. Please make sure that the mobile number in your profile is up-to-date to avoid any issues during pick-up.

May I ask someone else to pick-up the order from the Click & Collect location?

It is your prerogative to request another person other than the recipient’s name to collect the order from the Click & Collect location. Please ensure that the representative has the OTP with him. Otherwise, we will not be able to track and release the order.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.answer:
How can I track my order?

You can view the current status of your order/s with us on My Profile > Order History. Further tracking of delivery can be done through the courier partner’s website.

May I get a call prior to delivery?

We are unable to provide a call prior to your delivery. However, ShopSM will inform you via email when your order has been released to our courier partners. Our courier partners also endeavor to send you an SMS prior to delivery, when possible. Please be sure your mobile number is accurate both in your profile and the shipping details to ensure timely receipt of any notices from us or our courier partners.

Do you deliver on weekends or holidays?

Most of our courier partners deliver from Monday to Saturday, barring any unforeseen events that might delay deliveries.

What if I am not at home or cannot personally receive my order?

If you or the recipient name indicated in the order are not around to personally receive the order, you can authorize another person to receive the order on behalf of the addressee. Just be sure to prepare a signed authorization letter and a photocopy of a government ID, so your authorized representative can receive the items on your behalf.

settings.title: What shipping options are available?
settings.answer:
What shipping options are available?

You have two options to receive your order. You may opt to pick-up the item at one of our Click & Collect locations or you can have the order delivered to your nominated address.

For delivery, you can opt to pay using any of our payment methods – credit card, debit card or cash on delivery. Meanwhile, for Click & Collect, we currently offer credit and debit card payment options.

Does ShopSM charge fees for shipping?

ShopSM charges fees for shipping depending on location, dimensions, and weight of your item. We have base shipping rates of P99 for Metro Manila, Luzon, Visayas and Mindanao. Additional fees will apply for every kg in excess of 2kg depending on volumetric weight of item and shipping destination for Luzon, Visayas and Mindanao.   Sample Computation:  Length x width x height / 3500.   To compute:

(NCP-10065305- BATH TUB) volumetric weight  38 x 28 x 66 / 3500 = 20.064 kg

Total volumetric weight of the tub 20.064kg x 45 = 900 pesos

900 pesos + 99 = 999

Here is our standard Shipping 

Location Base Rate Added on in excess of 2kg Metro Manila 49 30 Luzon 49 40 Visayas  99 45 Mindanao 99 50

 

Where can I check the fees that I will be charged for shipping?

During the checkout process, you will be able to find the chargeable shipping fee in the order summary. This may still change depending on the final delivery location you indicate in the Shipping Details.

settings.title: How can I get my refund?
settings.answer:
How can I get my refund?

Once your return has been approved by our Customer Service Associates at the branch, you will have the option of receiving a credit voucher that can be used at the store to purchase a replacement of the item you have, or if the item is not available in the store, other item/s.

If you paid for your item via credit card, you may also choose to have the charges reversed. However, this may take longer depending on your issuing bank. Once processed, we recommend checking your next billing statement for validation. We will process the charge back once the request has been made in the store.

How long is the credit voucher valid for?

The credit voucher is valid for the 30 days, where the first day is the date of issuance. Please visit any of THE SM STORE branches to be able to use the voucher. Unfortunately, we will not be able to extend the validity of the credit voucher once it has expired.

Can the credit voucher be reprinted if lost or stolen?

The credit voucher is as good as cash. Once the voucher is lost or stolen, we are sorry but we are not able to reprint it again. Please secure the credit voucher to ensure the barcode is still readable.

Can I use my credit voucher for my next online transaction on shop.sm.com?

We are working on this feature in the succeeding months. For now, credit vouchers may only be used at any of THE SM STORE branches nationwide.

How long does the replacement and refund process take?

Replacing your item/s in any of THE SM STORE branches will only take a few minutes, given that all requirements are met according the Return and Exchange Policy. Once our Customer Service Associate has validated the item/s and issued your credit voucher, you may already select a replacement item. Should the replacement item's price be lower than the credit voucher value, no refund shall be given. Meanwhile, you will need to settle any excess amount if the replacement item's price is higher than the credit voucher value.

Should you prefer to request for a refund, credit vouchers shall be immediately generated while you wait in the store. However, for credit card charge back, it may take longer as it will be highly dependent on your credit card issuing bank. We recommend checking your next billing statement for validation.

Will my shipping fee be refunded when I return my item/s?

Since the courier has already performed its delivery service, we shall no longer include the shipping fee in the refund.

I received a cancellation notice from ShopSM. How will I get a refund?

We are sorry for having to cancel your order. For prepaid orders, you don't have to do anything, as we will process the refund immediately for you. We encourage you to check your next billing statement to verify the refund. 

How much will I be refunded?

We will refund the amount you paid for the item, net of any promo vouchers used, shipping fee, and other discounts applied to your order. For discounted item/s or item/s on sale, the amount to be refunded is the amount you paid for and not the original selling price of the item.

settings.title: How do I return an item I purchased online?
settings.answer:
All returns/exchange have to be initially processed through shopsm.com and completed in any of THE SM STORE branches nationwide. Visit My Profile > Order History and you will have the option to return items that have already been tagged as 'Delivered' or 'Pick up Completed.' Once you’ve completed the return request, you will receive a returns form with corresponding returns authorization number via email. Please print this form, sign it, and bring this form with you to the store within the returns window period. 

If the item/s you wish to return/exchange have not been tagged as delivered and you may have already received them, contact our Customer Care here.

Please bring your returns form together with the item/s in their original packaging, with complete accessories and attached price tag to our Customer Service Counter in any of THE SM STORE branches. They will assist you in checking and processing your return request.

How long is your returns/exchange window?

You may apply to return/exchange any item purchased from our website within thirty (30) days from the date when you received your order, where day one is the receiving date. Just be sure to create the return request on the website within that time frame.

What can I return?

Valid reasons for return and exchange:

receive a product that is fundamentally different in nature from the product specified in the website; receive a faulty, defective, or damaged product; receive a product that is not as advertised on the platform; wrong item is delivered; or change of size (for fashion items).

Be sure that all items to be returned/exchanged are still in their original packaging, with complete accessories and attached price tag.

Please note that returns/exchange of intimate apparel or items considered as generally hygienic in nature (e.g., underwear, socks, stockings, earrings, etc.) will not be accepted at any of our branches for any reason. For consumable items, only sealed or unused can be requested for return/exchange.

Where can I return/exchange the items I bought from ShopSM?

You can return/exchange the items to any of THE SM STORE branches nationwide, subject to our Return and Exchange Policy. Please make sure to initiate the return request by going to your Order History page before proceeding to the store. Note that our Customer Service Associates will not process online order return requests without a return authorization number.

Can I return/exchange an item or parcel to your courier partner?

All returns/exchange of items are to be done through any of THE SM STORE branches nationwide.

What is a return authorization number?

The return authorization number (RAN) is the reference number generated by the website when you request for a return of ShopSM orders. This is an important number that you need to bring to any of THE SM STORE branches to be able to complete your return request.
